<style>
#app {

  color: #14141B;

  overflow-x: hidden;
}
body {
  margin: 0;
}
nav {
  position: absolute;
  display: flex;
  z-index: 3;
  width: 100%;
  justify-content: flex-end;
  align-items: flex-end;
  height: 80px;
  font-family: "Poppins", sans-serif;
}

nav a {
  color: #ffffff;
  font-weight: 200;
  height: 100%;
  width: 80px;
  align-items: flex-end;
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  padding: 20px;
  padding-right: 0;
  text-decoration: none;
  text-align: center;
  transition: all 0.4s ease-in-out;
}

nav a.router-link-exact-active {
  color: #ffffff;
  font-weight: 200;
  height: 100%;
  width: 60px;
  border-bottom: 6px solid #ffffff;
  background-color: #42b983;
  align-items: flex-end;

}

  background-color: #42b983;

}
</style>
